sql-select.name: GetDatabaseEnterpriseEditionFeatures
Enterprise Edition Features in Use
sql-select.description: Checks each user database and reports which EE features are in use – like compression, partitioning, or Transparent Data Encryption (TDE).
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT t.[feature_name] AS [FeatureName] FROM [sys].[dm_db_persisted_sku_features] t GROUP BY t.[feature_name] ORDER BY t.[feature_name] ;
